chapters.title: Chapter 19: Memories
chapters.info: Queen Mordrellen Mantear, p. 356 (252)—By the Grace of the Light, Queen of Andor, Defender of the Realm, etc. before Morgase. Her death and the previous disappearance of her daughter Tigraine set off the Succession, called the Third War of Andoran Succession by those not from Andor. Note: there was also a queen of Andor named Modrellein, who reigned approximately 700 years ago. Her name is often confused with that of Mordrellen—or perhaps this is an inconsistency in the books. See also Damodred, Taringail; Damodred, Tigraine; Trakand, Morgase.
